\n Test for Payment Transaction with Multiple partners\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
\n Test Simple view of an Accounting Transaction\n
open${base_url}/AccountingZuite_markChanged
verifyTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}
selectAndWaitselect_moduleAccounting
selectAndWaitselect_actionAdd Payment Transaction
assertValuefield_my_source_sectionorganisation_module/my_organisation
assertValuefield_my_destination_section_title
assertValuefield_my_resourcecurrency_module/euro
assertText//span[@id=\'listbox_record_number\']3 record(s)
select//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[2]/selectlabel=40 - Payable
select//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[2]/selectlabel=41 - Receivable
select//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[2]/selectlabel=5 - Bank
typefield_my_destination_section_titleClient 1
clickAndWait//button[@name=\'Base_edit:method\']
assertPortalStatusMessageData Updated.
assertValuefield_my_source_sectionorganisation_module/my_organisation
assertValuefield_my_destination_section_titleClient 1
assertValuefield_my_resourcecurrency_module/euro
assertValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[2]/selectaccount_module/payable
assertValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[2]/selectaccount_module/receivable
assertValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[2]/selectaccount_module/bank
clickAndWaitlink=payable
typefield_my_destination_section_titleSupplier
clickAndWait//button[@name=\'Base_edit:method\']
assertPortalStatusMessageData Updated.
clickAndWait//a[3]/span[1]
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[3]Supplier
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[3]Client 1
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[3]Client 1
\n \n \n
